section.name: About itracker
section.p: itracker is a true open source issue tracking system licensed under the LGPL license.
itracker is built using Java enterprise technology.
itracker is a professional, easy to use, open, integratable, fast, modular, customizable and scalable solution for all kind of projects.
Currently there is a bunch of people rewriting itracker towards a new Release 3.0. The refactoring is based on Spring 2.0, Hibernate 3 and Struts 1.X.
The Release 3.0 is now ready as Release Candidate. We are currently preparing the last Release Candidate 3.
You can also now start to test drive our Release 3.0 from the trunk. It's quite stable.
